venue.name: Panera Bread (in Porter Square shopping center)

item.description:
After a few quiet months, the Boston Poetry Union is restarting a new regular workshop series, for members who'd like to share their recent writing for discussion and feedback.

All current Meetup members are welcome to attend, and to invite people from outside the group as their guests. Please bring enough copies of your work to share with the group -- if you don't have access to printing, email your submissions to zakbos@gmail.com so that arrangements can be made to get copies for the workshop.

The moderator for the Spring 2013 workshops will be Andrew Chenevert (Creative Writing, Lesley University).
item.name: BPU Weekly Writers Workshop
